creditline: Gift of Richard and Linda Parins
description: Soldiers pushing a cannon through water
markings: \'DBAL189\', in pencil, lower left corner, on back; untranslated stamp, in Russian, at lower right corner on back, \'PRINTED UNDER THE SUPERVISION OF/TATIANA BALTERMANTS/FROM a NEGATIVE BY/DMITRII BALTERMANTS/THIS IS PRINT NO. 24/25 [illegible signature]/[copyright] ESTATE OF DMITRII BALTERMANTS\', on stamp, at lower right corner, on back
title: Crossing the Oder River
